Instruction: Heat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Prepare a muffin pan by lining each of the compartments with paper liners.
Combine self-rising flour and sugar in a large bowl. Stir in milk and mayonnaise until a smooth batter forms. Spoon batter into lined muffin cups.
Bake the muffins in a 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) oven for 25 to 30 minutes until golden brown and doubled in size.
